title: Textile, before ca. 1950
medium: Technique: linoleum block-printed on plain weave
markings: Printed on right edge, "DESIGNED BY LANETTE."
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 159 x 134.5 cm (5 ft. 2 5/8 in. x 52 15/16 in.)
description: Large flowers and leaves on a thick stem running up the middle of the design and printed in shades of brown.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, before ca. 1950.
before ca. 1950. Technique: linoleum block-printed on plain weave. Gift of Lanette Scheeline. 1998-29-7.
